attributes.name: Burden of Despair
attributes.name_with_affixes: Burden of Despair of the Scholar
attributes.description: "Not for what is or has been, but for what is to come."
attributes.parsed_description: "Not for what is or has been, but for what is to come."

attributes.name: Cael's Veil
attributes.description: "In each lie there may be truths, and in each truth there may be lies. The difference stops mattering after so long lived."
attributes.parsed_description: "In each lie there may be truths, and in each truth there may be lies. The difference stops mattering after so long lived."
